com.ericsson.nrgsdk.examples.applications.whereami
Class Feature

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ericsson.nrgsdk.examples.applications.whereami.Feature
public class Feature
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the logic of the application. It uses processors to interact with Ericsson Network Resource Gateway.

          Initializes a new instance, without starting interaction with Ericsson Network Resource Gateway (see start)

stop

public void stop()
Stops interaction with the Ericsson Network Resource Gateway and disposes of all resources allocated by this instance. Note: this method is intended to be called at most once.
